page.title: 19POLICING IN TIBBERTON 1
page.content:
{LAW AND ORDER}-There is not a great amount of crime in the area,but occasionaly there is a major accident,an assault or even a murder. Most of the crimes are usually burglaries,petrol syphoning and minor complaints
{DEATHS}-When there is a death, W.P.C.Adams has to go and check that there are no suspicious circumstances and if there are she must give a report.
{PATROL AREA}-The district that she covers includes nine villages which are Tibberton, Crowle, Bredicot, Broughton,Hackett,Sale Green Huddington,Libbery,Upton Snodsbury and Cowesdon.
